description: Multi-purpose data points for defining a curve.  The use of this generic class is discouraged if a more specific class can be used to specify the X and Y axis values along with their specific data types.
comment: Adapted from CIM and https://github.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/ data models

contents.name: xvalue
contents.comment: The data value of the X-axis variable,  depending on the X-axis units.

contents.name: y1value
contents.comment: The data value of the  first Y-axis variable, depending on the Y-axis units.

contents.name: y2value
contents.comment: The data value of the second Y-axis variable (if present), depending on the Y-axis units.

contents.name: Curve
contents.comment: The curve of  this curve data point.
